item.title: Modern Frontend Explained
item.description: There’s cool series of articles at medium from Peter Jang explaining evolution of frontend approaches to JS, CSS and structuring applications. I highly recommend it for anyone starting with frontend. modern CSS explained modern JS explained comparing frontend approaches
